name: KritterQuest
description:
KritterQuest is a micro  game inspired by zelda link awakening. 

Controls:

WASD - walk

G- attack

Esc - menu

I created the game assets from scratch except the house. I wanted to test my speed and skills in creating and developing a game in 4 days and somehow, this experience taught me alot about my workflow,  limitation and best of all my imagination. I would like to thank UnidayStudio for hosting this jam. I really had fun. 

I will revisit this in the future and maybe make a complete rpg out of this.
